section.45: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Sa'eed bin Jabair said:"The people of Al-Kufah differed concerning this verse: 'And whoever kills a believer intentionally. So I went to Ibn 'Abbas and asked him, and he said: 'It was revealed among the last of what was revealed, and nothing of it was abrogated after that
